scripts.build-style: npm run bundle-scss && npm run webpack -- --config config/webpack.style.js --progress --profile --bail
scripts.copy-i18n: mkdir -p dist/core/bundles/assets/adf-core/i18n && cp -R core/i18n/* dist/core/bundles/assets/adf-core/i18n && mkdir -p dist/content-services/bundles/assets/adf-content-services/i18n && cp -R content-services/i18n/* dist/content-services/bundles/assets/adf-content-services/i18n && mkdir -p dist/process-services/bundles/assets/adf-process-services/i18n && cp -R process-services/i18n/* dist/process-services/bundles/assets/adf-process-services/i18n && mkdir -p dist/insights/bundles/assets/adf-insights/i18n && cp -R insights/i18n/* dist/insights/bundles/assets/adf-insights/i18n
scripts.copy-assets: cp -R core/assets/* dist/core/bundles/assets && cp -R content-services/assets/* dist/content-services/bundles/assets && cp -R process-services/assets/* dist/process-services/bundles/assets
scripts.build: npm run lint && rm -rf node_modules/@alfresco && npm run build-bundles && npm run build-style && npm run copy-i18n && npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-app-schema && npm run bundlesize-check
scripts.build-bundles: npm run build-core && npm run link-core && npm run build-content && npm run link-content && npm run build-process && npm run build-insights
scripts.test-export: npm run build-export-check && npm run export-check
